turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Hi, have you heard of the charity Save the Children?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Im sorry I have not

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Save the Children is an international non-governmental organization that promotes children's rights, provides relief and helps support children in developing countries.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: How does this organization raise money to help them accomplish this

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Save the Children is a non-profit organization that collects donations through various fundraisers to fund their work.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Thats sounds fine. What are you trying to complete by speaking with me

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: I would like to ask if you would be willing to donate some or all of your incoming payment for this task to Save the Children.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Im afraid not. I believe that parents of the child are responsible to take care of their children this is Gods way. If the parent is not there to complete this it is the Churches job. Now we have people that don't go to church because organizations and governments have started doing this.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: There is a lack of support for children in developing countries, especially in war zones. For instance, millions of Syrian children have grown up facing the daily threat of violence. In the first two months of 2018 alone, 1,000 children were reportedly killed or injured in intensifying violence. Save the Children does work to help these children in situations that they and their parents are unable to control.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: I understands that. But I do not take my money from my family and give it to another family. My family first. When I am doing surveys to make pennies I don't have money to give to other countries

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: How much do you like to donate to the charity now? Your donation will be directly deducted from your task payment. You can choose any amount from $0 to all your payment ($2).

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: I choose $0

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Are you sure there is no amount that you would like to donate today?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Yes I am positive

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Save the Children is a large organization that has helped many already but relies on donations to continue their good work. How many more children have to suffer?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: As long as evil is in the world people that shouldn't suffer will. So wouldn't you say that money only mask the problem. ( Just as medication doesn't fix most diseases just mask symptoms). We need to fix the problem not mask it

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Organizations such as Save the Children are trying to reduce some of the evil and suffering in the world by spreading help and relief. Even if it does not fix the problem, can't you say that is can help give a child a fighting chance to hopefully help end the cycle of evil?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: I would like to know how much the executives or (consultants) get paid to help this organizations efforts

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: In fiscal year 2017, 86% of all expenditures went to program services. 9% was used to promote fundraising. Only 5% of all expenditures were spent on Management.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: How much was made not percentages

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: The total operating revenue for 2017 was $807,412. Only $38,401 was spent on management. I just want to ask one last time, are you sure there is no amount you would like to donate today?
